actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

actions.subcommittee: the Civil Service and Agency Organization
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Civil Service and Agency Organization.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide competitive civil service status for National Guard technicians who are involuntarily separated other than for cause from National Guard service.

summary.text: Amends provisions governing awarding competitive civil service status to national guard technicians who are involuntarily separated from service by eliminating the requirements that such a person: (1) served as a technician for at least three years; and (2) passes a suitable noncompetitive examination.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide competitive civil service status for National Guard technicians who are involuntarily separated other than for cause from National Guard service.
